catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 500
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: comic books depicting changes after foreigners entered Japan; mostly text; color image of four men with globe heads (lanterns?) securing what looks like hot air balloon; black and white image of Japanese couple serving Western woman seated on chair; Japanese figure with globe head seated on a horse, with monkey at side; Japanese man eating at a table with Western utensils; blue cover with floral impression
medium: Woodblock printed book; ink and color on paper
title: Collection of Humorous Leftovers (Kokkei zansai bukuro 滑稽残菜嚢), vol.
